channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 16:52 Driving in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 16:52 Driving in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
